nodes.text: The S-SC4 Bloodmark was a starfighter used by the Sith Empire which performed in scout roles. Created by the Tandankin shipyards, the Bloodmark sacrificed some speed and maneuverability in exchange for advanced sensors and communications technology, as it served as squadron coordinator in battle.

The S-SC4 Bloodmark was introduced in the 2014 expansion Galactic Starfighter to the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, released by BioWare in 2011. A pet model of the starfighter was released in the
Star Wars: The Old Republic Cartel Market.
